column2: CRA International, Inc. is a consulting firm, which applies advanced analytic techniques and in-depth industry knowledge to complex engagements for clients. The company is headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts and currently employs 687 full-time employees. The firm provides economic, financial and management consulting services. The firm consulting services in two areas: litigation, regulatory, and financial consulting and management consulting. The firm provides services, such as economic capability, analyses and testimony in areas, such as Antitrust & Competition; Damages & Valuation; Financial Accounting & Valuation; Financial Economics; Forensic & Cyber Investigations; Insurance Economics; Intellectual Property; International Arbitration; Labor & Employment; Mergers & Acquisitions; Regulatory Economics & Compliance; Securities & Financial Markets, and Transfer Pricing. The company offers management consulting in the areas, including Auctions & Competitive Bidding; Corporate & Business Strategy; Enterprise Risk Management; Environmental & Energy Strategy; Intellectual Property & Technology Management; Organization & Performance Improvement, and Transaction Advisory Services.
